item.title: Holding on to Burnout
item.description: Don't you just hate running around all day, schedule packed to the brim, phone buzzing every five minutes? It's crazy! No human should have to live like that, constantly frazzled. If you live like that, you probably promise yourself to slow down one day, but you haven't yet. You actually do choose that life. As my Landmark Forum coach would've said, "You loveÂ it!" I know I have uttered the words, "
